TopicTitle: Any mods for 1.6 that can help with landing a 3.5m or 2.5m rover?

Articles.Content: Anyone know of any good payload mods that can help deliver a rover in a 2.5 or 3.5 size?

Do you mean the rover's in that size, or the parts are?

For the rover - check out the Karibou.  It's 2.5m size, and has some rockets that will help greatly with any landing in that size.  (Actually, check out the Feline Utility Rover as well - it's side-mounted rockets are very nice and flexible.)

For the parts...  a recent one that has some nice parts for delivering cargo is flat-bottomed shuttle systems.

On 2/16/2019 at 6:08 PM, DStaal said:

Do you mean the rover's in that size, or the parts are?

For the rover - check out the Karibou.  It's 2.5m size, and has some rockets that will help greatly with any landing in that size.  (Actually, check out the Feline Utility Rover as well - it's side-mounted rockets are very nice and flexible.)

For the parts...  a recent one that has some nice parts for delivering cargo is flat-bottomed shuttle systems.

Sorry for the late reply. I'm sorta thinking of parts like a hollowed out nose 2.5m nose cone with cargo doors.  Or some inline cargo delivery system that I can slap on my third stage of my rockets. And horizontal inline landing legs & engines.
